name: Social Enterprise NI
goal: Social Enterprise NI is the representative body for social enterprises across Northern Ireland. We are an independent, member-led organisation and the gateway to Social Enterprises in Northern Ireland. A central meeting place for collaboration, sectorial development, sharing information and best practice.We aim to unite & promote Social Enterprises and their supporters into a strong campaigning force acting as the first point of contact for the media and the public, promoting a positive vision for social enterprise.We provide a range of services policy and lobbying, building supply chains and promoting our members. Industry awards, Conferencing, best practice and piloting new initiatives. We hold the secretariat for the All Party working group on Social Enterprise at the Northern Ireland Assembly.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Information Society, Regional Policy, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU procurement
Lobbying at NI Assemble for social value legislation
